song.title: The Stories from the Dawn of Imagination III
song.info:
The last part of "The Stories" series, there was a fourth part that was being planned to continue the series but unfortunately it was left unfinished or not released, however this was also an entry for Intel Outside '96 multichannel compo, got unranked.
sample list: By Falcon/Substance [28.08.1996]
Dedicated to all fans of this music style, especially to:
Ania Pawlowska Akira Unreal Scorpik and Paradise...
Thanx to Scorpik for some very cool smps.
Contact me for mods and samples swap at: Jacek Dojwa Wesola 37/31 50521 Wroclaw Poland.
This module is my contribution to Intel Outside 1996.
(p) Screw!Bolt 1996 (c) Cosmos records.
...to be continued
